name: commit_details
description: Details about commits including lines of code changed and files changed.

dimensions.name: oid
dimensions.description: The unique identifier for each commit.

measures.name: max_lines_changed
measures.description: The maximum number of lines of code changed in a single commit.

measures.name: max_files_changed
measures.description: The maximum number of files changed in a single commit.

sample_questions: Which commit had the most lines of code changed?
Which commits had the most changed files?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT oid, additions, deletions, changed_files FROM commits.commits
